The education to be secured by searching the Scriptures is an experimental knowledge of the plan of salvation. 
                                                                           43
Such an education will restore the image of God in the soul. It will strengthen and fortify the mind against temptation, and fit the learner to become a co-worker with Christ in His mission of mercy to the world. It will make him a member of the heavenly family; and prepare him to share the inheritance of the saints in light.
